title: Which is the best flavored cake in Malappuram? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best cakes available in malappuram, I could say that sweet infusion, makes a lot of cakes with different tastes and flavors. She has a signature cake that will satisfy our hearts. She's got the best cakes in town. She has variety of chocolate cakes,kunafa,vanilla birthday cake,chocolate orange,rafaello,ferrero,nutella,german chocolate cake,etc. for more information visit her instagram page or website
